text: Krais Zisas, nza tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi gu mbigi, ana taagip nza ndir zav kha nuianan zergi. Kha kameŋ ne guigi guarara, kha gumgi zam kha kameŋ mbararagip, ne khothɨgɨri. Gu guigira tɨvi mbatɨgi ga muuŋgi guma guar ma. Gu muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi, nta guigira kha gumgi mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi kambarigi. Gu fharav kha gumgi kharav, tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui guma ma.
